description: Focus on target domain, zero setup, monitoring and resiliency patterns included. In this session I will code, explain and deploy microservices on docker. Stock IDE, stock platform and lightening fast deployments. Getting things done in 1h. Questions are highly welcome.
short_description: Focus on target domain, zero setup, monitoring and resiliency patterns included. In this session I will code, explain and deploy
title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Adam Bien - Coding Microservices Effectively
